title: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra; aizes from 32C to 50DD; ajustable straps in the front; 90% nylon, 10% spandex; everyday bra pack and 1 satin bra; leopard print and other colors (white, nude, and others)
descriptions:
**Product Title:** Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra

**Product Description:**

Introducing the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, designed to provide full coverage and comfortable support for plus-size women. This wirefree bra is made from a soft and breathable material blend of 90% nylon and 10% spandex, ensuring a smooth and gentle fit against your skin.

**Key Features:**

- **Full Coverage:** Enjoy complete coverage and support with our full-coverage design, perfect for everyday wear.
- **Wireless Support:** Experience the comfort of wireless support, featuring a wide band and rows of hook and eye closures for a secure fit.
- **Adjustable Straps:** Front-adjustable straps allow for a customizable fit, ensuring you can achieve the perfect level of comfort and support.
- **Leopard Satin:** Add a touch of style to your wardrobe with our beautiful leopard satin design, available in a range of colors including white and nude.

**Pack Contents:**

- 1 x Wireless Bra (Leopard Satin)

**Size Range:**

- Available sizes: 32C - 50DD

**Material Composition:**

- 90% Nylon
- 10% Spandex

**Care Instructions:**

- Machine wash cold
- Gentle cycle recommended
- Dry flat or tumble dry on low

**Order Now:**

Experience the comfort and support of the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack. Order now and enjoy a full-coverage, wirefree bra that's perfect for everyday wear.
